name: city-council-minutes
title: Data from the published City Council Minutes

fields.name: record_id
fields.description: The original record-id. Assigned by the City Council. Usually has the following format: serialnumber underscore year. If the agenda item does not refer to any record-id the following format is used: 'U' + date of meeting + page.

fields.name: date_of_meeting
fields.description: The date of the City Council meeting.

fields.name: page_number
fields.description: The page-number from the annually printet minutes.

fields.name: transcribed_text
fields.description: The transcribed text from the specific agenda item dealing with the aforementioned record-id.
